name: Surviving 2020
description:
Welcome to our
"TO Jam Hindsight is 2020" submission!

2020 has been a rough year for all of us. Sometimes, it's okay to poke fun at it and see the humour in it. At least we hope you agree because we definitely tried! Keep an eye out for cameos from some of our favorite characters!

Prime Minister Speaking Moistly
Trumpskin
The Beloved Toilet Paper Roll
Proper Mask Hygiene Couple
"Bunch of Yahoos"

The current version was made in just about a week by a team of 4 people. We had a lot of fun making it and we hope you have just as much fun playing it. We're hoping to get a few patches out in the coming weeks to fix some issues. It's not perfect by any means, but it's something!

Remember, avoid speaking moistly and stay the blazes home!

Meet the team Programmers

Rocco Briganti

Galen Manuel

Game Designer

Tynan Manuel

Artist

Khadijah Ennis

Install Instructions Windows

There a couple steps you will need to do to play the game. Please follow the instructions below. 

  1.  Once you have downloaded the game, you will receive a ZIP file named Surviving2020_WIN64_V01
  2.  Right click > Extract All... 
  3.  In the popup window, choose where you want to unzip the contents of the game
  4. Check Show extracted files when complete if it is not checked already
  5. Click Extract
  6.  Once the contents has unzipped, a window will popup with the game files. Double-click on Surviving2020
  7.  A window may popup from Windows titled Windows Protected Your PC. Don't worry! This is not a virus, but just Windows being cautious about opening applications from unknown publishers
  8. Click on More Info and this will present you with the option to Run Anyway. 

Click that and the game should start up! Enjoy! Leave a comment with any feedback if you like. We are open to hearing what you think, even if you didn't like the game!
